hero.title: Assisted Monitoring of
hero.description: Aurora Scholar is an academic writing platform that implements AI-assisted monitoring, ensuring that thinking is human, mediation is technical, and authorship is verifiable on-chain. The system does not write new content. It organizes, translates, and audits coherence of ideas previously declared by the student, preserving intellectual autonomy and ethical responsibility.

layer01.label: Layer 01
layer01.title: Declared Intuition
layer01.description: Mandatory space where the student describes, in free language, the intention of the paragraph or section. This semantic anchor is hashed and versioned.

layer02.label: Layer 02
layer02.title: Linguistic Mediation
layer02.description: AI reformulates the text without adding new content, only adjusting clarity, logical coherence, and academic register. User must explicitly choose or reject suggestions.

layer03.label: Layer 03
layer03.title: Coherence Monitoring
layer03.description: AI audits logical coherence between declared intuition and mediated text. It indicates gaps or contradictions, never suggesting how to write, only what needs clarification.

principles.label: Ethical Principles
principles.title: Our Commitment to Academic Integrity
principles.principle2: All mediation is explicit and auditable.

step01.label: Step 01
step01.title: Connect Wallet
step01.description: Securely connect your Solana wallet to begin your ethical writing journey.

step02.label: Step 02
step02.title: Declare Intuition
step02.description: Articulate your core ideas in free language. This forms the semantic anchor for your work.

step03.label: Step 03
step03.title: Write Free Text
step03.description: Develop your academic content in the editor, knowing your initial intent is recorded.

step04.label: Step 04
step04.title: Request Mediation
step04.description: Ask the AI to refine your text for clarity, coherence, and academic register, without adding new concepts.

step05.label: Step 05
step05.title: Choose Reformulation
step05.description: Select the AI's best reformulation or reject them, maintaining full intellectual control.

step06.label: Step 06
step06.title: Coherence Audit
step06.description: The AI audits the logical consistency between your intuition and the mediated text, highlighting gaps.

step07.label: Step 07
step07.title: Confirm Responsibility
step07.description: Sign your intellectual responsibility for the final content, ensuring human authorship.

step08.label: Step 08
step08.title: On-Chain Registration
step08.description: Hashes of your intuition, final text, and AI scope are immutably recorded on Solana.

step09.label: Step 09
step09.title: Publish
step09.description: Publish your article publicly in the journal or privately with controlled access.
